Title: Wulong.Qiushi
Description:
Wulong.Qiushi is a windows phone 7 client for http://www.qiushibaike.com which is a popluar website in China for people to share the embrassment moments.
It is powered by Caliburn.Micro, Reflection Extensions, the purpose is to deliver user a friendly and responsive UI.

I am studying the best practice on Windows Phone 7 platform recently and this project is my lab as well.

If you have any interest to join me, please feel free to contact me.
